mn88:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn88:3.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
mn88:3.4: Sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena pubbārāmo migāramātupāsādo tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
mn88:3.5: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo ekapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāgaṃ abhiruhitvā sāvatthiyā niyyāti divā divassa.
mn88:3.6: Addasā kho rājā pasenadi kosalo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
mn88:4.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
mn88:4.2: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkama;
mn88:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandāhi:
mn88:4.4: ‘rājā, bhante, pasenadi kosalo āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti;
mn88:4.6: ‘sace kira, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa na kiñci accāyikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, āgametu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando muhuttaṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti. “
mn88:4.7: Evaṃ, devā”ti kho so puriso rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
mn88:4.8: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
mn88:4.9: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
mn88:4.10: “rājā, bhante, pasenadi kosalo āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati;
mn88:4.12: ‘sace kira, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa na kiñci accāyikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, āgametu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando muhuttaṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
mn88:5.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yāvatikā nāgassa bhūmi nāgena gantvā nāgā paccorohitvā pattikova yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
mn88:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
mn88:5.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho rājā pasenadi kosalo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
mn88:5.4: “sace, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa na kiñci accāyikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, sādhu, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena aciravatiyā nadiyā tīraṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
mn88:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena aciravatiyā nadiyā tīraṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn88:6.2: upasaṅkamitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle paññatte āsane nisīdi.
mn88:6.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yāvatikā nāgassa bhūmi nāgena gantvā nāgā paccorohitvā pattikova yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
mn88:6.4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
mn88:6.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho rājā pasenadi kosalo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
mn88:6.10: Nisīdi kho rājā pasenadi kosalo paññatte āsane.
mn88:6.11: Nisajja kho rājā pasenadi kosalo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
mn88:6.12: “kiṃ nu kho, bhante ānanda, so bhagavā tathārūpaṃ kāyasamācāraṃ samācareyya, yvāssa kāyasamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehī”ti?
mn88:6.13: “Na kho, mahārāja, so bhagavā tathārūpaṃ kāyasamācāraṃ samācareyya, yvāssa kāyasamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
mn88:7.1: “Kiṃ pana, bhante ānanda, so bhagavā tathārūpaṃ vacīsamācāraṃ …
mn88:7.3: manosamācāraṃ samācareyya, yvāssa manosamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehī”ti?
mn88:7.4: “Na kho, mahārāja, so bhagavā tathārūpaṃ manosamācāraṃ samācareyya, yvāssa manosamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
mn88:8.2: Yañhi mayaṃ, bhante, nāsakkhimhā pañhena paripūretuṃ taṃ, bhante, āyasmatā ānandena pañhassa veyyākaraṇena paripūritaṃ.
mn88:8.3: Ye te, bhante, bālā abyattā ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā paresaṃ vaṇṇaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ vā bhāsanti, na mayaṃ taṃ sārato paccāgacchāma;
mn88:8.4: ye pana te, bhante, paṇḍitā viyattā medhāvino anuvicca pariyogāhetvā paresaṃ vaṇṇaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ vā bhāsanti, mayaṃ taṃ sārato paccāgacchāma.
mn88:9.1: Katamo pana, bhante ānanda, kāyasamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti?
mn88:13.2: “Yo kho, mahārāja, kāyasamācāro attabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, parabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, ubhayabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati.
mn88:13.3: Tassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti;
mn88:13.4: evarūpo kho, mahārāja, kāyasamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
mn88:18.2: “Yo kho, mahārāja, manosamācāro attabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, parabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, ubhayabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati.
mn88:18.3: Tassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti;
mn88:18.4: evarūpo kho, mahārāja, manosamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
mn88:19.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bhante ānanda, so bhagavā sabbesaṃyeva akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vaṇṇetī”ti?
mn88:20.1: “Katamo pana, bhante ānanda, kāyasamācāro anopārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti?
mn88:24.2: “Yo kho, mahārāja, kāyasamācāro nevattabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, na parabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, na ubhayabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati.
mn88:24.3: Tassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti.
mn88:24.4: Evarūpo kho, mahārāja, kāyasamācāro anopārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
mn88:29.2: “Yo kho, mahārāja, manosamācāro nevattabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, na parabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati, na ubhayabyābādhāyapi saṃvattati.
mn88:29.3: Tassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti.
mn88:29.4: Evarūpo kho, mahārāja, manosamācāro anopārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
mn88:30.1: “Kiṃ pana, bhante ānanda, so bhagavā sabbesaṃyeva kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadaṃ vaṇṇetī”ti?
mn88:31.3: Iminā ca mayaṃ, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitena attamanābhiraddhā.
mn88:31.4: Evaṃ attamanābhiraddhā ca mayaṃ, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitena.
mn88:31.5: Sace, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa hatthiratanaṃ kappeyya, hatthiratanampi mayaṃ āyasmato ānandassa dadeyyāma.
mn88:31.6: Sace, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa assaratanaṃ kappeyya, assaratanampi mayaṃ āyasmato ānandassa dadeyyāma.
mn88:31.7: Sace, bhante, āyasmato ānandassa gāmavaraṃ kappeyya, gāmavarampi mayaṃ āyasmato ānandassa dadeyyāma.
mn88:31.10: Ayaṃ me, bhante, bāhitikā raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena vatthanāḷiyā pakkhipitvā pahitā soḷasasamā āyāmena, aṭṭhasamā vitthārena.
mn88:31.11: Taṃ, bhante, āyasmā ānando paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
mn88:32.1: “Ayaṃ, bhante, aciravatī nadī diṭṭhā āyasmatā ceva ānandena amhehi ca.
mn88:32.2: Yadā uparipabbate mahāmegho abhippavuṭṭho hoti, athāyaṃ aciravatī nadī ubhato kūlāni saṃvissandantī gacchati;
mn88:32.3: evameva kho, bhante, āyasmā ānando imāya bāhitikāya attano ticīvaraṃ karissati.
mn88:32.4: Yaṃ panāyasmato ānandassa purāṇaṃ ticīvaraṃ taṃ sabrahmacārīhi saṃvibhajissati.
mn88:32.5: Evāyaṃ amhākaṃ dakkhiṇā saṃvissandantī maññe gamissati.
mn88:33.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
mn88:33.2: “handa ca dāni mayaṃ, bhante ānanda, gacchāma;
mn88:33.5: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo āyasmato ānandassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
mn88:34.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando acirapakkantassa rañño pasenadissa kosalassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn88:34.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando yāvatako ahosi raññā pasenadinā kosalena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
mn88:34.6: “lābhā, bhikkhave, rañño pasenadissa kosalassa, suladdhalābhā, bhikkhave, rañño pasenadissa kosalassa;
mn88:34.7: yaṃ rājā pasenadi kosalo labhati ānandaṃ dassanāya, labhati payirupāsanāyā”ti.
mn88:35.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
